text: @HumanityForward Lost job lost house lost my buisness due to coronavirus  it destroyed  my life👍 im 30 with what looked like to be a bright future but all of my contracts have been canceled  now i look at my equipment soon to be hauled away and wonder whats the easiest  way out of this life! 🤮

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
